title: A Candle in Her Room
description: Melissa was sure it was the doll, Dido, who brought evil to the family, not once, but again and again. Three generations were haunted by the strange wooden doll. Each time Dido came to light there was disaster and tragedy. What could be done to overcome the power of the doll? This is a book about many evil, the dimensions of reality, the flow of generations, and surprisingly, the power of love.
author: Ruth M. Arthur
